body:
I've just seen the following crash of apiserver

```
fatal error: I0518 16:49:34.663726    3519 handlers.go:161] PUT /api/v1/namespaces/e2e-tests-density-c37gb/pods/density-latency-pod-1514-xph9f/status: (175.155856ms) 200 [[kubemar        k/v1.3.0 (linux/amd64) kubernetes/952e830] 104.154.120.247:40256]
concurrent map writes
```

From the go-routines logs it seems that the victim ones are:

